true N2zeA4Y9bTpRigvtHfLDBSMvwjs= false 1 Use user criteria in Knowledge Management to determine whether certain users can access knowledge bases and knowledge articles. After you create a user criteria record, you can assign it to knowledge base to control who can read and contribute to a knowledge base and its articles. You can further assign user criteria at an article level to control who can read it.Â
